import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import CoastersList from "../../components/CoastersList/CoastersList" import coastersService from "../../services/coasters.service" import { Container, Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import NewCoasterForm from './../../components/NewCoasterForm/NewCoasterForm' const CoastersListPage = ({ setToastMessage, setShowToast }) => { const [coasters, setCoasters] = useState() const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false) const openModal = () => setShowModal(true) const closeModal = () => setShowModal(false) const loadCoasters = () => { coastersService .getCoasters() .then(({ data }) => setCoasters(data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } useEffect(() => { loadCoasters() }, []) return ( <>

Galería de montañas rusas

{!coasters ?

CARGANDO

: }
Nueva montaña rusa ) } export default CoastersListPage
